form.storeSize: Amount of requests per category taken into account
form.storeSizeHelpText: Defines how many requests will be taken into account per category. More requests will be ignored and removed periodically by the cleanup job and at start-up
form.cleanupExpressionHelpText:
Sets the cron expression for the cleanup job that removes old requests from the store. 
The default value is "0 0 2 * * ?", which means it runs every day at 2 AM.

tableActions.labelFilterHelp: The search filter refers to the labels specified on the stored requests shown in the "Show details", e.g. URL, method name, exceptions or a message. Which labels are set on a request depends on the category and the implementation of the request.

traceMonitor.description: May modify the global trace monitor configuration
